steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Navigate to the location where you want to insert the fraction symbols.
Click on the 'Insert' tab in the Word ribbon.
In the 'Symbols' group, click on the 'Equation' button.
From the drop-down menu, select 'Insert New Equation'.
In the equation editor, click on the 'Fraction' button.
Choose the type of fraction you want to insert (e.g., stacked fraction, linear fraction).
Enter the numerator and denominator values for the fraction.
Click outside the equation editor to exit and return to the Word document.
Verify that the fraction symbols have been inserted correctly.
